items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: GradientEditor.js is a lightweight JavaScript plugin designed to provide an intuitive UI for creating and managing CSS gradients. It supports multiple gradient color stops, directional adjustments, and pre-defined gradient templates.

items.content_html: üîç GitHub ID Finder is a simple web tool built with HTML, JavaScript, and styled using Tailwind CSS along with DaisyUI. This tool allows users to quickly find GitHub user IDs by entering a GitHub username. The app utilizes CDN links for Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI for a lightweight setup.
items.title: tahmidjihan/js-API-Github-Id-FInder: üîç GitHub ID Finder is a simple web tool built with HTML, JavaScript, and styled using Tailwind CSS along with DaisyUI. This tool allows users to quickly find GitHub user IDs by entering a GitHub username. The app utilizes CDN links for Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI for a lightweight setup.
